mapinfo.detailsText: In the Underworld, on the River Styx there are no fish. Your Villagers start scattered with no Town Center, and must race to claim a Settlement during the time that combat is prevented.
mapinfo.loadDetailsText: In this version of Nomad, on the river Styx there are no fish to eat. Your Villagers start scattered with no Town Center, and must race to claim a Settlement during the time that combat is prevented. Will you choose an easily defensible location or one near many resources?
